name: Vision of Voodress
tooltip:
Vision of VoodressLevel 60

Good news, <name>. Molthor be singin' your praises lately. He say how you be turnin' into a real hero of Zandalar.

He also say for Maywiki to polish your orb some more! Give it here so Maywiki can brighten the vision.

Requirements:
- Vision of Voodress
